oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Video - Memphis Sounds with George Klein - Episode #44
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: television; Klein, George; music; Whalum, Kirk; Stax Records; Williams, Jason D.; Pitts, Charles "Skip"; Church, Buddy; Perrin, Karen; Cropper, Steve;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: George Klein interviews saxophonist Kirk Whalum, musician Jason D. Williams, FM 100's Karen Perrin, guitarists Skip Pitts and Buddy Church, and Stax musician Steve Cropper. Includes performance clips of The Buckinghams, Isaac Hayes, Booker T. and the MGs, and the Blues Brothers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: WYPL
